text: Penama is one of the six provinces of Vanuatu. It has three main islands: Ambae, Maewo and Pentecost, as well as many other smaller islands. Its capital is Saratamata. The name of the province comes from the first letters of the three main islands: PENtecost, Ambae and MAewo. ==References== Category:Provinces of Vanuatu
title: Penama Province
